description:
Feldewelt was an Imperial Commodore who served under http://anidb.net/ch186 [Reinhard von Lohengramm] as his adjutant shortly after the Imperial Civil War. However, since he was unable to perform his duties to Reinhard`s standard, Feldewelt was replaced in the form of a promotion to rear admiral, with his position being taken by http://anidb.net/ch297 [Arthur von Streit].
Source: Gineipaedia
name: Feldewelt
